Title: Archimède, le clochard
Writer: Jean Gabin (original idea), Albert Valentin (scenario), Michel Audiard (adaptation), Gilles Grangier (adaptation), Albert Valentin (adaptation), Michel Audiard (dialogue)
Actors: Jean Gabin, Darry Cowl, Bernard Blier, Dora Doll
Plot: Bum Archimede wants to spend the winter in prison, but to get there proves not to be that easy.
